trans-unit.source: Contains properties that are used to constrain the set of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> objects returned by a call to <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows(System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions)" />.
trans-unit.target: Contiene las propiedades que se utilizan para restringir el conjunto de objetos <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> devueltos por una llamada a <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows(System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions)" />.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> contains properties that are used to constrain the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method against the tracking data in a database used by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> contiene propiedades que se utilizan para restringir el conjunto de objetos <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> devueltos por el método <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> contra los datos de seguimiento de una base de datos utilizada por <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> in the collection of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> must correspond to a workflow instance which has tracking data associated with it in the database that meets the conditions specified by the properties of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>.
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> en la colección de objetos <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> devueltos por una llamada a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> debe corresponder a una instancia de flujo de trabajo que tenga datos de seguimiento asociados en la base de datos que cumple las condiciones especificadas por las propiedades de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions" />.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> class.
trans-unit.target: En la siguiente tabla se muestran los valores iniciales de las propiedades de una instancia de la clase <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>.

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Propiedad.

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: Valor

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue>.

trans-unit.source: An empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> vacío.

trans-unit.source: A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Referencia nula (`Nothing` en Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Referencia nula (`Nothing` en Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: These values specify that a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> should return a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> object for every workflow instance that has tracking data in the database.
trans-unit.target: Estos valores especifican que una llamada a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> debe devolver un objeto <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> para cada instancia de flujo de trabajo que tenga datos de seguimiento en la base de datos.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates creating an instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> class.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo crear una instancia de la clase <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the Workflow Monitor SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: Este ejemplo pertenece al SDK del monitor de flujo de trabajo.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Workflow Monitor Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [ejemplo de Monitor de flujo de trabajo](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).

trans-unit.source: Resets the properties of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions" /> to their default values.
trans-unit.target: Restablece las propiedades de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions" /> a sus valores predeterminados.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> class.
trans-unit.target: En la siguiente tabla se muestran los valores iniciales de las propiedades de una instancia de la clase <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>.

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Propiedad.

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: Valor

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue>.

trans-unit.source: An empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> vacío.

trans-unit.source: A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Referencia nula (`Nothing` en Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Referencia nula (`Nothing` en Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: These values specify that a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> should return a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> object for every workflow instance that has tracking data in the database.
trans-unit.target: Estos valores especifican que una llamada a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> debe devolver un objeto <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> para cada instancia de flujo de trabajo que tenga datos de seguimiento en la base de datos.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that specifies the upper limit of the time period that, together with <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus" />, is used to constrain the set of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> objects returned by a call to <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows(System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions)" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece un valor <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> que especifica el límite superior del período de tiempo que, junto con <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus" />, se utiliza para restringir el conjunto de objetos <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> devueltos por una llamada a <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows(System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions)" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that specifies the upper limit of the time period used for matching workflow instances with a status specified by <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> que especifica el límite superior del período de tiempo utilizado para encontrar coincidencias de instancias de flujo de trabajo con un estado especificado por <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.DateTime.MinValue" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es <see cref="F:System.DateTime.MinValue" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> constrains the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to those workflow instances that have the <xref:System.Type> specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, that have the status specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> during the period specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> restringe el conjunto de objetos <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> devueltos por una llamada a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> a las instancias de flujo de trabajo que tienen <xref:System.Type> especificado por <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, que tienen el estado especificado por <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> durante el período especificado por <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> y <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A> y que extrajeron datos que coinciden por lo menos con uno de los objetos <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> especificados por <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> value specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A> is inclusive.
trans-unit.target: El valor <xref:System.DateTime> especificado por <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A> es inclusivo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how the status of a workflow instance is matched, see the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre cómo se encuentran coincidencias con el estado de una instancia de flujo de trabajo, consulte la propiedad <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If `WorkflowStatus` is set to null, then `StatusMaxDateTime` and `StatusMinDateTime` are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Si `WorkflowStatus` está establecido en null, `StatusMaxDateTime` y `StatusMinDateTime` se omiten.

trans-unit.source: All workflow instances will be returned when `GetWorkflows` is called.
trans-unit.target: Se devolverán todas las instancias de flujo de trabajo cuando se llame a `GetWorkflows`.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates setting the StatusMaxDateTime property.
trans-unit.target: En el siguiente ejemplo se muestra cómo establecer la propiedad StatusMaxDateTime.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the Workflow Monitor SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: Este ejemplo pertenece al SDK del monitor de flujo de trabajo.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Workflow Monitor Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [ejemplo de Monitor de flujo de trabajo](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that, together with <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus" />, is used to constrain the set of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> objects returned by a call to <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows(System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions)" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece un valor <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> que, junto con <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus" />, se utiliza para restringir el conjunto de objetos <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> devueltos por una llamada a <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows(System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions)" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that specifies the lower limit of the time period used for matching workflow instances with a status specified by <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> que especifica el límite inferior del período de tiempo utilizado para encontrar coincidencias de instancias de flujo de trabajo con un estado especificado por <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.DateTime.MinValue" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es <see cref="F:System.DateTime.MinValue" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> constrains the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to those workflow instances that have the <xref:System.Type> specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, that have the status specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> during the period specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> restringe el conjunto de objetos <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> devueltos por una llamada a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> a las instancias de flujo de trabajo que tienen <xref:System.Type> especificado por <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, que tienen el estado especificado por <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> durante el período especificado por <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> y <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A> y que extrajeron datos que coinciden por lo menos con uno de los objetos <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> especificados por <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> value specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> is inclusive.
trans-unit.target: El valor <xref:System.DateTime> especificado por <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> es inclusivo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how the status of a workflow instance is matched, see the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre cómo se encuentran coincidencias con el estado de una instancia de flujo de trabajo, consulte la propiedad <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If `WorkflowStatus` is set to null, then `StatusMaxDateTime` and `StatusMinDateTime` are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Si `WorkflowStatus` está establecido en null, `StatusMaxDateTime` y `StatusMinDateTime` se omiten.

trans-unit.source: All workflow instances will be returned when `GetWorkflows` is called.
trans-unit.target: Se devolverán todas las instancias de flujo de trabajo cuando se llame a `GetWorkflows`.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates setting the StatusMinDateTime property.
trans-unit.target: En el siguiente ejemplo se muestra cómo establecer la propiedad StatusMinDateTime.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the Workflow Monitor SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: Este ejemplo pertenece al SDK del monitor de flujo de trabajo.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Workflow Monitor Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [ejemplo de Monitor de flujo de trabajo](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a list of data extract values which are used to constrain the set of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> objects returned by a call to <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows(System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions)" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece una lista de valores de extracto de datos que se utilizan para restringir el conjunto de objetos <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> devueltos por una llamada a <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows(System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions)" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.List`1" /> of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue" /> objects that contains specified values to be matched for data extracted from the workflow instance or a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.List`1" /> de objetos <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue" /> que contiene valores especificados con los que se debe coincidir para los datos extraídos de la instancia de flujo de trabajo o una referencia nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> en Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> constrains the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to those workflow instances that have the <xref:System.Type> specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, that have the status specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> during the period specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> restringe el conjunto de objetos <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> devueltos por una llamada a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> a las instancias de flujo de trabajo que tienen <xref:System.Type> especificado por <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, que tienen el estado especificado por <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> durante el período especificado por <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> y <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A> y que extrajeron datos que coinciden por lo menos con uno de los objetos <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> especificados por <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> can contain <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem> records that contain data that is extracted from the workflow.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> pueden contener registros <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem> que contengan datos que se extraen del flujo de trabajo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> property contains <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects that specify certain values for this extracted data.
trans-unit.target: La propiedad <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> contiene objetos <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> que especifican ciertos valores para estos datos extraídos.

trans-unit.source: If the workflow instance meets the other criteria specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> is not a null reference (`Nothing`), the extracted data stored in the database for a workflow instance must match one or more of the extracted data values specified by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> property for a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> object to be returned for the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Si la instancia de flujo de trabajo cumple los otros criterios especificados por <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> y <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> no es una referencia nula (`Nothing`), los datos extraídos almacenados en la base de datos para una instancia de flujo de trabajo deben coincidir con uno o más de los valores de datos extraídos especificados por la propiedad <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> para poder devolver un objeto <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> para la instancia de flujo de trabajo.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> is a null reference (`Nothing`), the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned will not be constrained by the values of the extracted data for any of the workflow instances in the database.
trans-unit.target: Si <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> es una referencia nula (`Nothing`), los valores de los datos extraídos para cualquiera de las instancias de flujo de trabajo en la base de datos no restringirán el conjunto de objetos <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> devueltos.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus" /> value that is used to constrain the set of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> objects returned by a call to <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows(System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions)" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el valor <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus" /> que se utiliza para restringir el conjunto de objetos <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> devueltos por una llamada a <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows(System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions)" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus" /> values or null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Uno de los valores <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus" /> o null (<see langword="Nothing" /> en Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The default is null (<see langword="Nothing" />).
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es null (<see langword="Nothing" />).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> constrains the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to those workflow instances that have the <xref:System.Type> specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, that have the status specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> during the period specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> restringe el conjunto de objetos <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> devueltos por una llamada a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> a las instancias de flujo de trabajo que tienen <xref:System.Type> especificado por <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, que tienen el estado especificado por <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> durante el período especificado por <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> y <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A> y que extrajeron datos que coinciden por lo menos con uno de los objetos <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> especificados por <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.

trans-unit.source: A workflow instance is considered to have a status that matches <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> if the last <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> received for that workflow instance before or during the specified time period has its <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.TrackingWorkflowEvent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property set to a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> value that maps to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus?displayProperty=nameWithType> value specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se considera que una instancia de flujo de trabajo tiene un estado que coincide con <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> si el último <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> recibido para esa instancia de flujo de trabajo antes o durante el período de tiempo especificado tiene su propiedad <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.TrackingWorkflowEvent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> establecida en un valor <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> que se asigna al valor <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus?displayProperty=nameWithType> especificado por <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for the workflow instance must have a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> that is configured for the appropriate <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent?displayProperty=nameWithType> value.
trans-unit.target: Por consiguiente, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> para la instancia de flujo de trabajo debe tener <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> configurado para el valor <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent?displayProperty=nameWithType> adecuado.

trans-unit.source: Only <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> values that have been sent in workflow tracking records can be matched.
trans-unit.target: Sólo se puede coincidir con valores <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> enviados en registros de seguimiento del flujo de trabajo.

trans-unit.source: If no workflow tracking records have been sent for the workflow instance, the workflow instance is considered to have a status of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus.Created?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Si no se envió ningún registro de seguimiento del flujo de trabajo para la instancia de flujo de trabajo, se considera que ésta tiene un estado de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus.Created?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the mapping between <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> values and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> values.
trans-unit.target: En la siguiente tabla se muestra la asignación entre los valores de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> y los de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>.

trans-unit.source: TrackingWorkflowEvent value
trans-unit.target: Valor de TrackingWorkflowEvent

trans-unit.source: WorkflowStatus value
trans-unit.target: Valor de WorkflowStatus

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> is null (`Nothing`), the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned will not be constrained by status; in other words, a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> object will be returned for any workflow instance that matches the parameters specified by the other properties of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>.
trans-unit.target: Si <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> tiene un valor null (`Nothing`), el estado no restringirá el conjunto de objetos <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> devueltos; en otras palabras, se devolverá un objeto <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> para cualquier instancia de flujo de trabajo que coincida con los parámetros especificados por las otras propiedades de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates setting the WorkflowStatus property.
trans-unit.target: En el siguiente ejemplo se muestra cómo establecer la propiedad WorkflowStatus.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the Workflow Monitor SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: Este ejemplo pertenece al SDK del monitor de flujo de trabajo.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Workflow Monitor Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [ejemplo de Monitor de flujo de trabajo](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the workflow instance <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that is used to constrain the set of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> objects returned by a call to <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows(System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions)" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece <see cref="T:System.Type" /> de la instancia de flujo de trabajo que se utiliza para restringir el conjunto de objetos <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> devueltos por una llamada a <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows(System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions)" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Type" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es una referencia nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> en Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> constrains the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to those workflow instances that have the <xref:System.Type> specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, that have the status specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> during the period specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> restringe el conjunto de objetos <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> devueltos por una llamada a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> a las instancias de flujo de trabajo que tienen <xref:System.Type> especificado por <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, que tienen el estado especificado por <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> durante el período especificado por <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> y <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A> y que extrajeron datos que coinciden por lo menos con uno de los objetos <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> especificados por <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A> is a null reference (`Nothing`), the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned will not be constrained by workflow <xref:System.Type>; in other words, a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> object will be returned for any workflow instance that matches the parameters specified by the other properties of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>.
trans-unit.target: Si <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A> es una referencia nula (`Nothing`), el <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> del flujo de trabajo no restringirá el conjunto de objetos <xref:System.Type> devueltos; en otras palabras, se devolverá un objeto <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> para cualquier instancia de flujo de trabajo que coincida con los parámetros especificados por las otras propiedades de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>.
